abstract: A workers’ rights group in the United States released a report today detailing what it called brutal conditions and illegal practices in Chinese toy factories.
snippet: A workers’ rights group in the United States released a report today detailing what it called brutal conditions and illegal practices in Chinese toy factories.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI, Aug. 21  A workers’ rights group in the United States released a report today detailing what it called brutal conditions and illegal practices in Chinese toy factories, many of which supply some of the world’s biggest brand-name toy makers, including Disney, Hasbro and Sega.

headline.main: Report Cites Brutal Conditions in Chinese Factories
headline.print_headline: Report Cites Brutal Conditions in Chinese Factories

abstract: A workers’ rights group in the United States released a report Tuesday detailing what it called brutal conditions and illegal practices in Chinese toy factories.
snippet: A workers’ rights group in the United States released a report Tuesday detailing what it called brutal conditions and illegal practices in Chinese toy factories.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI, Aug. 21  A workers’ rights group in the United States released a report on Tuesday detailing what it called brutal conditions and illegal practices in Chinese toy factories, many of which supply some of the world’s biggest brand-name toy makers, including Walt Disney and Hasbro.

headline.main: U.S. Group Accuses Chinese Toy Factories of Labor Abuses
headline.print_headline: U.S. Group Accuses Chinese Toy Factories of Labor Abuses
